patch 7.4.1493
Problem:    Wrong callback invoked for zero-id messages.
Solution:   Don't use the first one-time callback when the sequence number
            doesn't match.
attachments.title: patch 7.4.1493
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.1493
Problem:    Wrong callback invoked for zero-id messages.
Solution:   Don't use the first one-time callback when the sequence number
            doesn't match.
